name: CYBORG: RoboBot Hunter (Weekly Hour Game Jam)
name_original: CYBORG: RoboBot Hunter (Weekly Hour Game Jam)
description:
This game, well, prototype more like, is for the Weekly Hour Game Jam. I made it in  about one hour and thirty minutes. You're supposed to make the game in one hour but it took me an extra 30 minutes to program the AI. I hope I don't get disqualified for that. ;)

Story: You're a cyborg cowboy bounty hunter that is after Kengy the Shem, a robot that likes to blow up planets for no particular reason. You must invade their hideout and kill every single robot, including Kengy the Shem.

Well that's the best story that I can come up with at the moment.

Credits: All assets, some sounds and all music by me, Dave Microwaves Games
